"Now, sir", she declared with authority, "you shall explain yourself". You tried your best, telling her that you were traveler from a faraway place that had magically appeared in her building to better understand the world. "A traveler, you say? This reminds me of that chapter from Gulliver's Travels. Though I doubt he wore such strange clothing" she responded.

You were surprised to hear her speak of the book. You knew it was written in this century, but you had clearly underestimated the extent of this woman's intelligence. You braved a question, "Ma'am, who are you?"

She erected herself, as she was slouched over on a chair, and stated, "You stand before Baroness Victoriana, sir. I am the authority of the immediate lands around here." When you asked where the baron was, she sadly stated that he had passed away several years ago. "He was a good man and a faithful lover, and left all that he had to me", she wistful remembered.

"But enough of that", she concluded, "it is time for rest, and you are a most interesting figure. We will talk more in the morning. For now, you must tell me where you wish to sleep."

Eventually the medieval Irishwoman works up the courage to approach the giant girls to seek their help. There's no guarantee they will help, but if she doesn't seek their help she is guaranteed to be killed by wild animals or starvation, so there is really no other option. So reluctantly, the servant girl creeps forward until she is next to the sandaled feet of one of the colossal girls and pokes at the exposed skin of her ankle.

The ankle belongs to a 17 year old black girl named Aisha, who feels something and instinctively looks down to see what's going on at her feet. As soon as she does this, her jaw drops and her eyes become wide in surprise at what she is seeing. In the glare of the campfire, she makes out the image of a tiny little medieval girl with bright red hair and a green dress. "Holy crap!" she exclaims. The other girls look towards her to see what she is going on about. "There's a freakin little fairy girl down at my feet!" Aisha says and screams.

The other girls rush over, and all of them are equally astounded by what they are seeing. After a few seconds of gasping and muttering, Aisha reaches down and grabs the tiny Irishwoman with her dark hand and raised her to her face. "W-who are y-you? W-what are you?" she asks.

The Irishwoman explains things to the teenage girls as best as she can, with her thickly accented and high-pitched voice. She also tells them about the tiny man (you) imprisoned inside of her undergarments.

"No way!" the girls exclaim in excitement (apparently the prospect of there being a boy, no matter how tiny, is very appealing to them).

The tiny Medieval woman is beginning to think this might not have been such a great idea afterall, because suddenly giant fingers start reaching for her dress in an apparent attempt to undress her and reveal you to them.

Next...

You wake up hot and swetty, there is steam everywhere and you can barley see your hand in front of your face. Off in the distance you can see the outline's of huge figurs moving in the distance. She towers over you like a building and is compleatley naked.

She lifts her titanic foot and it slams down right on top of you! You think for sure that you're dead but you open your eyes and look around to see walls of flesh on either side of you. You realize that you're between this goddesses' toes just as she lifts her foot again. The walls of flesh that are her toes close in on you as she lifts her foot takeing you with it. You feel your self rapidly lifted in to the air and then slammed down on to the ground several times before you finally fly out from between her toes and land on the marble floor.

After that tramtic experiance you try to figgure out what the hell happined. You must have shrunk when you went through the time machine and are now less than an inch tall! You look around to see giant women everywhere, some are naked and some are wearing loose togas. There are marble colums all around the room and a large pool of water in the center. Surrounding the pool of water are several kettle's holding burning embers and every so often one of the women in togas would poor water on them causing all the steam that was filling the vast room. You're in the Roman bath's....... and luckily the woman's bath.

141.content:
You jump. Right in the moment a gigantic bare foot stomps right by your side. A foot big enough to crush thirty men of your size.
For a couple of seconds you behold the monument sized woman towering above you.
Her legs rise up more then three hundred feet above, they're sweat, met themselves in a forest of pubic hair. You see her belly and breasts. And her brown hair, tied. Around her head, with wires.
Really a goddess.
Her colossal foot rises up and you see the vast bare sole to move away from you.
The goddesses walks toward the lagoon sized bath where other godesses as big as her, already are.
They are everywhere. Each one as big as a 30 store building, maybe bigger.
You really feel small. Something has gone wrong with the time travell.
You remember to see the register numbers in the machine screen. 50 B.C. The location was Rome. This seem to be correct. But your size...!
You walk toward the enormous bath tube.

As you came closer two of the goddesses emerge.
Once again you're almost stomped. You pass between the two godesses.
This time huge drops of water fall down from their colossal bodies and hit you like a bombing.
Large puddles of water take shape in the floor. As big as gulf camps. Are mere puddles for the goddesses but when you get in one of them the water level reach your knees. And the water seem to be thicker, more consistent, like a gel.
There are five giant women in the bath tube now. Three of them with the water a little below their shoulders, sometimes you see a knee emerge from the water like an island. There are other two sitted on the edge of the tube. With their feet in the water. As they move their feet provokes huge tidal waves.
They talk each other, and their talking are like the sound of a storm. They speak a lenguage that seem to be a little fammiliar but you cannot understand. Latin. Of course. You think
And they didn't even noticed you yet. You're nothing to them, you think to yourself.

But suddenly, the eyes of one of the goddesses spot you, and before you can do anything an enromous hand grabs you betweeen the thumb and forefinger, and you're lifted in the air.
You look below, the the water, The sensation is like to be flying over the ocean.
The hand stops right in front of an enormous builtifull face, right before a pair of green eyes as big as windows.
She stares at you for almost a minute, until she says something to the other women. And other two faces came closer.
Now huge and beautifull faces fulfills your enitire view field, everywhere you look. The other two women that were sitted on the edge get in the water, And below you the waves agitate.
The monstrous fingers release you in the palm of a huge hand.
And the young giant beauties talk each other, you can get some words.
"...Insecto ?"
They seem to be arguing themselves about what you are.
"Persona!"
"Homo !!!
"Pusillus! "
"Pauxillulus!"
"Homo!"
"Homullus"!
"Homonuculus!"
And you undrestand that they find out that you're a man. Though a very very small man.

You swing back-and-forth, inside the pouch, for what seems like an eternity. And, while en route to wherever your new "mistress" is taking you, you hear one of the other Vestal Virgins worthlessly nattering on about having thirteen brothers, who never write to her!

Deva, the head virgin, finally removes you from the pouch. Seeing that you're shivering, and that your teeth are chattering, she picks you and strips you of your clothes! Luckily, however, you quickly go back to hugging your upper torso, so she cannot remove your interpretron. For, without that wristwatch-like device, two-way conversations with this Roman giantess will be impossible. And, it helps even further that something else has caught her attention.

Something that shrunk after you began to cool off. But, which she now stirs back to life with her inquisitive touching!

"By the gods! Vulcan has surpassed himself, in designing you, Little Pinocchious."

"Th-Th-Thank you, mistress," you stutter, teeth still chattering. Deva, seeing this, shakes her head in self-reproach. She wraps you up inside the smallest towel she can find. Then, she places you next to an oil lamp before squeezing juice from a grape into your mouth.

After what feels like twenty minutes, you notice that she has brought you to what must be her private apartment.

"Thank you, Pinocchious. Would you care for a tour?"

"Yes, mistress. Please."

The woman soon walks through an open doorway into a building, surrounding her are pots of many flowers that her and her mother sell. They take turns running the downstairs flower shop in day-to-day cycles, with today being a minor holiday dedicated to one of the elder senators that died not long ago, she closed shop early and is off tomorrow. She walks up the stairs to the second floor where her and her mother's quarters are. As she heads to her room, she passes by her mother who looks the same except being older with her mother being only thirty-three as her mother had her at only fifteen years old. Their father died in a carriage accident unfortunately but his inheritance and the flower shop provides plenty for them. The women exchange their greetings before your captress tells her mother that she is going to be in her bedroom for a while and to leave her be.

You turn on the translator of the device as you anticipate the giantess talking...

"Hi, little one. How are you so small?" The woman asks.

You talk and your voice goes through the transmitter, she is not able to notice the device in your pocket or that your voice is actually being translated assuming you just know Latin as her empire has taken over most of the European world after all. You don't want to tell her you are from the future traveling time and got shrunk in the process so you decide to make up a small lie.

"Uhhhh, my memories still hazy but I think the Gods have done this to me!" You yell up so she can hear your/the device's tiny voice.

"Oh! Well that make sense, hm, you probably don't even know where you're from. With your skin tone and clothing you must be from the East which would make you a slave." She says as she uses her giant index finger to start rubbing your clothing and inadvertently poking you causing you to stumble.

"P-please don't turn me in!" You plead to her.

"No! Of course, not. The gods have delivered you onto me, I will be your mistress. You can serve me and my mother. My name is Livia." She says as she grabs you between her two fingers and places you down on the floor forcing you to look all the way up at her full standing height.

What will she have you do...?

1442113.content:
Livia sits on her bed as she looks down and smiles down as she holds you to her face. "You will have to worship me as a goddess." "What?" you ask. Livia lets out a laugh. "Well," she says. "You appear to be from the East and I happen to be much bigger than you, ergo, my mother and myself are goddesses to you and you will worship both of us as long as you live under our roof. You wouldn't dare argue with a goddess would you." Livia smiles down at you and you let out a sigh. You really couldn't argue with her. While she was benevolent, at your shrunken height, Livia was a walking tower. You let out a sigh. "Alright," you say. "Goddess Livia." Livia gives a giggle before you hear some more thunderous footsteps. "Livia?" asks Livia's mother as she enters the room. "Who are you talking to?"

You look up and see Livia's mother looming over you. She looks like an older version of her daughter but with a redder shade of brown in her hair. "Mother," says Livia. "This small man was sent from the land of the gods. He will be our servant from now on." Livia's mother looks down at you in surprise and lowers her head as you step back and nearly fall out of Livia's hand before Livia props you up with her finger. "By Jupiter," says Livia's mother. "I have never seen a being so small. I thought that ant men were only the creatures of mythology. From that complexion, he's definitely of a slave race. Hmmm. This might actually be a good thing. I mean, we don't have enough for a normal laborer and I guess a small man is as good as ever." You give a gulp. "Well," you think. "At least they both seem friendly enough."

Livia's mother sits on the bed next to her daughter and giggles. "Alright," says the older giantess. "I am Goddess Cassia. To survive, all you have to do is tend to me and my daughter, Goddess Livia." "Y-Yes ma'am," you say nervously. "I mean, yes, Goddess Cassia." Livia and Cassia turn to each other and nod their heads before giggling. "Okay, our little servant," says Cassia. "For your first chore, you are to give your goddesses each a foot massage." "Sounds fair." You say with a nod.

Livia puts you on the ground and she and Cassia put their enormous feet in front of you that create a minor quake as they land. Now, whose feet do you decide to massage first?
